content: **milla kal cardigan** join the **milla kal** milla is a cardigan knitted from the light and fluffy novita hehku 1 yarn and it can be styled in many different ways choose your favorite version of the cardigan from **4 different options** milla classic 2 milla cropped 3 milla long 4 & milla wrap 5 this versatile cardigan is a true wardrobe staple the **milla cardigan** pattern is suitable even for beginners and it includes four different versions a wide size range from xs to 5xl and numerous color options you can also easily adapt the pattern to suit your own style choose whether you want short three-quarter or long sleeves for your milla cardigan and finish it off with details like pockets buttons or ties choose your favorite version buy the yarn and join the knit-along a new part of the pattern will be released on novita com 6 every monday starting june 16th pattern is divided in 5 sections and the last part of the pattern will be released on monday 14th of july the milla cardigan is knitted with novita hehku 7 a striking mohair blend yarn made of 60% mohair and 40% wool over 20 color options available in novita s online store **sizes** **xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl** **finished dimensions** body circumference 96 104 112 120 128 136 144 152 160 cm / 37 75 41 44 47 25 50 5 53 5 56 75 59 75 63 in sleeve and back length varies in different milla versions -
